TextView.android:text: symptoms • Fever. • Chills. • Abdominal pain. • Flu-like symptoms. • Dark-colored urine and/or clay-colored stool • Yellow skin • Whites of the eyes appear yellow • Pruritus and mild to severe itching • Nausea and fever accompanied by loss of weight food to take • buttermilk • clear juices • dal water • coconot water • chicken • herbal tea or coffee • proyine rich food • high fibre food • vitamins • fruits • vegetables • honey • yoghurt • milk thistle food to avoid • alcohol • fatty and fried foods • refined sugares and carbohydrates • refined sugures and carbohydrats • seafood • red meat • canned food • salt and excessive iron
